mapper.update: update goods_category set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, category_code = #{categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, category_code, name, create_time, update_time from goods_category
